title: The Girl in the Hockey Jersey
description: When a mystery girl wearing my hockey jersey and a matching toque to mine tumbles out of a post-game party, I have to follow her. When we end up at the bar, trading stories and laughs? I have to make a play for the rest of the night. That she only wants one night, and doesn't want to give me her nameâ€¦those are problems for the morning. And that tiny niggle of worry? I have to ignore it...The Girl in the Hockey Jersey is a novella-length, one-night stand prequel that takes place two years before The Playing Game, a full-length novel!
author: Ainsley Booth
